column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Wednesday January 1 for the New Year's Day holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday January 2 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-75S at 72 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: Roadway shutdown about 4 miles south of Berea exit 76 until further notice due to a serious collision.

column3: I-75S at 72 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: Detour:  Exit 76 -> US-25S -> Mt Vernon Exit 62 -> I-75S
